same problem as gherheart.
i entered the key and it registered fine. now when i open the programme it asks me for a product key and none of the ones from the text file are valid.
any solutions for this?

1) Open Regedit

2) Go to Edit -> Find and search for WZD (delete it and WXD) with or without "Match whole strings only"

3) Also delete HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\ALP\option

Enjoy!
If program happen to stop working again, open regedit and delete HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\ALP\option again.

In Windows 7, if you cant find "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\ALP\option"

Go to Edit -> Find and mark "Match whole string only" or not, and then search for "ALP" and if it finds option, delete it.

Hint: Those unhappy about the quality of their rip when using AVI, you can check the original bit-rate while playing it on PowerDVD9 or VLC and change the Bit-rate in the options for the profile.

It can make a large difference even if it's off just by a few hundred.
